trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is ready to lead the way to Radiata.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_TODO_00<tab>Stay alert for imperial soldiers on the way to Specula Imperatoris.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_TODO_01<tab>Enter Specula Imperatoris and stay alert for imperial soldiers.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_TODO_03<tab>Stay alert for imperial soldiers on the way to Radiata.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>Hm! I knew the Alliance had spies in Gyr Abania, but in Radiata? Impressive...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>...I suspect a handpicked contingent of the Ala Mhigan Brigade's finest would have been equally, if not more, qualified...but what do I know.

TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_PIPIN_000_010<tab>Perhaps you recall the night we first met outside the Sil'dihn ruins, under such unfortunate circumstances? I had just returned from a meeting with my Ala Mhigan agents. As I said before, we have been preparing for this day.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_SERPENTOFFICER_000_015<tab>We have lost so many men already... If we suffer another defeat like that, this campaign is over.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_STORMOFFICER_000_020<tab>We will have our retribution. It is but a matter of time.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_RAUBAHN_000_025<tab>Had Alphinaud not volunteered you, I would have asked. If anyone can see this mission through, it's you.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ARENVALD_100_030<tab>We'll be fighting with the main host when the time comes to attack Castrum Abania. I swear by everything that is holy─we won't lose!

TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_VMAHTIA_100_035<tab>There you go again, getting all worked up...though it could be worse. So long as you don't start saying bollocks like, “I'll never forgive them!” Makes for a terrible battle cry, you know?
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_JMOLDVA_100_040<tab>Many of the J tribe call this place home. I shudder to think what would become of them if we fail.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_100_040<tab>Thanks for standing by me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Together, we'll make Conrad proud!
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>So, to review: we are to travel to Radiata, where we will meet with a contact recruited by Marshal Tarupin's agents.

TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>I took the liberty of reviewing intelligence reports while <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Lyse were away, so the settlement is not wholly unfamiliar to me...

TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_032<tab>As the vice marshal indicated, the vast majority of the populace is employed as menial labor in either Specula Imperatoris or Castrum Abania. Perhaps as a result of this, the Resistance has long struggled to make inroads there.

TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_MNAAGO_000_033<tab>Aye, you have the right of it. They got a better deal than most Ala Mhigans─feeding off what scraps the imperials gave 'em. Damned if I know how Marshal Tarupin's agents got one of them to turn his coat.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>I understand your disdain, I do. But I also understand their desire to look after their families by any means necessary...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>Our contact is a Roegadyn woman. She will ask us a question. After we answer with “courage,” she will know us as friends.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_000_036<tab>"Courage.“ Right. Put together a squadron, Naago. We'll need them soon.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_037<tab>With me, my friends─and be ready for anything.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALISAIE_000_038<tab>Keep an eye out, would you? Something doesn't feel right...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_000_039<tab>I know you're out there...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_100_039<tab>If there were magitek armor nearby, surely we would have heard them by now?
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_200_039<tab>See? What did I tell you? Let us continue on to Specula Imperatoris!
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_BALLOON_100_040<tab>Savages!?
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>Whew. That would have been an unceremonious ending to our tale.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_000_045<tab>Heh, nothing to it!
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Of course there were still soldiers lurking about... Fortunately, they were no match for Lyse. Come─Radiata is not much further.
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>Of course, in light of our recent encounter, it would be prudent to proceed with caution and remain vigilant for imperial forces...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>I thought they said this was a village? It looks more like a work camp...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Nary a soldier in sight. Mayhap they were recalled to Castrum Abania...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_000_070<tab>Looks like it's safe to enter. I don't see any imperials...
TEXT_STMBDA616_02542_LYSE_000_071<tab>Hmm... I don't see smoke above Castrum Abania anymore. Do you think they fixed the cannon already...?
